snippet: The Day: In the 2012 election, it feels as if New York has been neglected more than necessary. But the city wasn't totally abandoned by White House aspirants. We had our moments.
abstract: The Day: In the 2012 election, it feels as if New York has been neglected more than necessary. But the city wasn't totally abandoned by White House aspirants. We had our moments.

headline.main: A Campaign Season of Neglect, With Some Notable Exceptions
